body.raw:
{
    "measures": [
        "Asset Count",
        "#Contracts",
        "TIV",
        "Gross Exposed Limit",
        "GroundUpLoss",
        "ContractLoss_Value All Types_GL",
        "Net Pre Cat Exposed Limit",
        "Net Pre Cat Loss",
        "Net of Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Net of Fac Loss",
        "Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Fac loss",
        "Treaty Exposed Limit",
        "Treaty Loss"
    ]
}

{
    "AdditionalSortMeasure": "TIV",
    "AttributeList": [
        "#",
        "Asset Number",
        "Asset Name",
        "Contract Number",
        "ContractLoss_Value All Types_EL",
        "TIV",
        "ContractLoss_Value All Types_GL",
        "Intensity",
        "GroundUpLoss",
        "Net Pre Cat Exposed Limit",
        "Net Pre Cat Loss",
        "Net of Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Net of Fac Loss",
        "Fac Exposed Limit",
        "Fac loss",
        "Treaty Exposed Limit",
        "Treaty Loss"
    ],
    "SortDirection": -1,
    "Count": 20,
    "TopNBy": "ContractLoss_Value All Types_EL",
    "ContractMode": false,
    "PercentageAttributes": false,
    "TopNAssetsBy": "ContractLoss_Value All Types_EL"
}
